### Overview depth and temp
```{r}
shark_tp_data %>% 
  #filter(transmitter_id == "A69-9004-14037") %>%  # If you want to look at one individual
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = detection_timestamp, y = Depth)) +
  scale_y_reverse()

shark_tp_data %>% 
  #filter(transmitter_id == "A69-9004-14037") %>%   # If you want to look at one individual
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = detection_timestamp, y = Temp))
```
